issue.title: [CF 1173] More settings for custom textures
issue.body:
When trying to setup TMW icons for the T18 Frost Mage 4pc bonus (4 stacks of fingers of frost), I ran in to some problems.

I am trying to recreate the look from popular WeakAuras, where you get a smaller version of the proc graphics in complement to your two ones to display the extra two charges of fingers of frost.

I use the texture at: Textures\SpellActivationOverlays\Frozen_Fingers

However, I have not found any way to mirror the texture, so that it looks ok on the right hand too. In WA there is a mirror-option so you can mirror your texture. This would be interesting both for the icon itself when you use custom textures, and on the image overlay in notifications.

Also, there is no way to actually set the size of the image. It is always a square. I see that you can load it as an Image Overlay as a notification and set the size of the image there, but I have not gotten that to work. When i go to Image Overlay, and enter the same path to the texture, nothing shows.

Thankful for any input you guys might have.


> Posted by CurseForge user hiar_nl | Imported from CurseForge issue #1173 | Raw

comments.body:
TMW isn't meant to be a one-for-one replacement for WA. TMW's primary function is to display icons. It isn't out of the question that I could add a new display method that would support things like this, but it isn't high on the list because I'd rather spend what time I can devote to the project on making it better at the things that it already does rather than making it good at things that other addons do.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
